word: H7355 - רָחַם - râcham - raw-kham' - Have compassion - இரக்கமாயிரு

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - அன்புகூரு, கிருபையாயிரு, இரங்கு, இரக்கம், மனதுருகு, லோருகாமா, மனதுருக்க மானவர், ருகாமா
to love, to love deeply, to have mercy, to be compassionate, to have ten der affection, to have compassion
b) (Piel) to have compassion, to be compassionate of God (or of man)
c) (Pual) to be shown compassion, to be compassionate

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: A primitive root; to fondle; by implication to love, especially to compassionate: - have compassion (on, upon), love, (find, have, obtain, shew) mercy (-iful, on, upon), (have) pity, Ruhamah, X surely.
Cognate: H3395, H3396, H3397, H7348, H7349, H7355, H7356, H7357, H7358, H7361, H7362
